org.nd4j.linalg.lossfunctions.impl

Class LossNegativeLogLikelihood

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.lossfunctions.impl.LossMCXENT
      • org.nd4j.linalg.lossfunctions.impl.LossNegativeLogLikelihood
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ILossFunction

    public class LossNegativeLogLikelihood
extends LossMCXENT
    Negative log likelihood loss function

    In practice, this is implemented as an alias for LossMCXENT due to the mathematical equivalence

    See Also:
